ygData.subject: Re:
ygData.msgSnippet: I agree with Shaphedra Paladin and several others that responed to Where are you? , many of us are out of college or school for the holidays now and are
ygData.messageBody:
I agree with Shaphedra Paladin and several others that responed to "Where are
you?", many of us are out of college or school for the holidays now and are
getting into some serious EQ playing. Only coming up for food and drink,
sometimes not even for that. ;)

I wish all of you that celebrate Christmas, a Merry Christmas. For those that do
not, I hope you have a safe holidays and enjoy whatever you are doing. ;)

Findar Tereshi, wizard, level 22, Bretoxxulus Server


Debbi wrote:

> From: Debbi <debbi@...>
>
> Actually we're all playing EQ because we're addicted!
>
> Shaphedra, Paladin, level 18, Mithaniel Marr server
>
> DP Twisted wrote:
>

> >
> > > Anybody out here... Seems like either the world has come to an end or im
> > > off the listserv.
> >
> > We're all on web forums :P
> >
> > Rick
> >
> > > Visit the EverQuest homepage at http://www.everquest.com
>
> > Visit the EverQuest homepage at http://www.everquest.com
